{{Description|Countless experiences have proven that one's own skills are the most reliable adventuring "tool." Honing various unique abilities in confrontations will undoubtedly benefit future exploits...}}
'''Quirky Quaking Arena''' is an [[Event]] in [[Version 5.5]].

==Event Details==
===Duration===
* 2025/04/21 10:00 - 2025/05/02 03:59

===Requirements===
* [[Adventure Rank]] 20 or above
* Complete [[Archon Quest]] [[Prologue]]: Act III "[[Song of the Dragon and Freedom]]"

===Summary===
* During the event period, Travelers can use trial characters to collect as many Adventure Coins as possible within the time limit. Complete the various challenges to earn [[Primogem]]s, [[Hero's Wit]], [[Sanctifying Unction]], and other rewards!
* In the first three days after the event starts, a new trial will be unlocked each day. You can play the unlocked trials through either solo or team matching.
* In each trial, use designated trial characters and collect as many Adventure Coins as possible within the time limit. Complete a trial stage for the first time to obtain the corresponding rewards.
* After completing a trial, you will earn Craft Points based on your performance. During the first three days of the event, the maximum number of Craft Points you can obtain will gradually increase, capping at 4,000 points. Collect the specified amount of Craft Points to claim corresponding rewards

===Tutorial===
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Quirky Quaking Arena 1.png
|text1  = In the "Quirky Quaking Arena" event, Travelers need to collect as many {{Color|help|Adventure Coins}} as possible within a limited time to earn more {{Color|help|Craft Points}}. Adventure Coins come in two sizes, and picking up larger Adventure Coins will grant more Craft Points.
|image2 = Tutorial Quirky Quaking Arena 2.png
|text2  = In the trial, touching an {{Color|help|Item Box}} will grant different Quirky Curios, some of which can {{Color|help|knock}} characters back. When Travelers use Quirky Curios to {{Color|help|knock back}} other characters, {{Color|help|they will receive a large amount of Adventure Coins as a reward}}. Conversely, when a character is {{Color|Pyro|knocked back}} themselves, they will lose a certain amount of Adventure Coins.
|image3 = Tutorial Quirky Quaking Arena 3.png
|text3  = This trial features numerous {{Color|help|Solidified Crystals}} and platforms. Use [[Varesa]]'s Elemental Skill to destroy these Solidified Crystals, which will grant {{Color|help|random items}} or {{Color|help|large amounts of Adventure Coins}}.
|image4 = Tutorial Quirky Quaking Arena 4.png
|text4  = This trial introduces a new Quirky Curio, the {{Color|help|Simulated Homing Missile}}. After using this item, you will enter Aiming Mode and {{Color|help|continuously accumulate Guidance Value}} toward a targeted character. Once guidance is locked on, a homing missile will be launched at the targeted character. If you successfully {{Color|help|knock back}} the character with the missile, a large amount of Adventure Coins will be awarded. Conversely, when your character is {{Color|Pyro|knocked back}}, you will lose a certain amount of Adventure Coins. {{Color|help|You cannot collect new Quirky Curios while in Aiming Mode}}.
}}

;Wavechaser{{Colon}} Heart of the Wrathful Tides
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Quirky Quaking Arena Wavechaser Heart of the Wrathful Tides 1.png
|text1  = This trial features numerous water bodies and platforms. Use [[Mualani]]'s Elemental Skill to move quickly across the water while dodging obstacles and collect Adventure Coins to score Craft Points.
|image2 = Tutorial Quirky Quaking Arena Wavechaser Heart of the Wrathful Tides 2.png
|text2  = This trial introduces a new Quirky Curio, the {{Color|help|Creeping Barrage}}. When used, a Creeping Barrage will be released at the current character's location that slowly expands outwards. It will {{Color|help|knock back}} any characters it hits. If you successfully {{Color|help|knock back}} a character with the Creeping Barrage, you will receive a large amount of Adventure Coins. Conversely, when your character is {{Color|Pyro|knocked back}}, you will lose a certain amount of Adventure Coins.
}}

;Soar{{Colon}} Amidst Steep Cliffs
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Quirky Quaking Arena Soar Amidst Steep Cliffs.png
|text1  = This trial features numerous Adventure Coins floating in the air. Use [[Kinich]]'s Elemental Skill to move at high speed and collect the Adventure Coins to earn Craft Points.
}}

;Swift Runner{{Colon}} Strike Like Flame
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Quirky Quaking Arena Swift Runner Strike Like Flame.png
|text1  = This trial features numerous platforms and slopes. Use [[Mavuika]]'s Elemental Skill to ride the flamestrider and move at high speed across multiple platforms and the circular arena, collecting Adventure Coins to earn Craft Points.
}}

;Chilling Frost{{Colon}} Astride the Vast Waters
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Quirky Quaking Arena Chilling Frost Astride the Vast Waters 1.png
|text1  = In this trial, certain bodies of water will periodically freeze into icy surfaces. {{Color|help|Use [[Kaeya]]'s Elemental Skill to freeze the water surface}}, allowing you to move between platforms and icy surfaces to collect Adventure Coins and earn Craft Points.
|image2 = Tutorial Quirky Quaking Arena Chilling Frost Astride the Vast Waters 2.png
|text2  = This trial introduces a new Quirky Curio, the {{Color|help|Scatter Bomb}}. This item causes a large cross-shaped explosion, {{Color|help|knocking back}} all characters within the blast range while also {{Color|help|destroying all icy surfaces in the area}}. Be sure to avoid it! When Travelers use Scatter Bombs to {{Color|help|knock back}} other characters, they will receive a large amount of Adventure Coins as a reward. Conversely, when a character is {{Color|Pyro|knocked back}} themselves, they will lose a certain amount of Adventure Coins.
}}

;Adaptation{{Colon}} In a Realm Mercurial
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Quirky Quaking Arena Adaptation In a Realm Mercurial.png
|text1  = One of five themes will be randomly selected for this trial. Choose the appropriate strategy based on the theme of the trial to collect Adventure Coins!
}}
